div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 993 Olbia (mod. Parutino), Ochakov raion, Nikolaev oblast, Ukraine, 1946 Burial: late 6th-5th cent. B.C. Contents: 31 AE. In ancient pit in agora Olbia: fish-shaped AE (anepigraphic [30]; as AMNG I.1, pl. 8, 5 [1]) Disposition: Kiev Kharko, "Ol'viia,‚Äù pp. 358-9, nos. 443-73
